Maybe we should add diagonal and diagflat:
https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.diagonal.html

Yeah, it's weird. I would not do it this way if I were designing an API from scratch. But a lot of our users come from NumPy or Matlab and they both have this behavior.

Maybe we should add `diagonal` and `diagflat`:
https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.diagonal.html
https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.diagflat.html
